post.body: How would I go about creating a ZeroNet proxy on a VPS?
Does clearing your browser cache reset your name and "about me"?
Is there a way to show a progress bar when downloading files from a Zite? Something like what MEGA does when downloading a file from their page.

comment.body: @Jayofthezero: Okay, that's to bad. Hoping for an API asap.
@Glightstar: Thank you. Sadly, the host I'm using doesn't allow open proxies :/
